column4: Anyone here available in PM for "aticonfig" tweaking in terminal?
Anyone here available in PM for "aticonfig" tweaking in terminal? I'm very new to ubuntu, but i would like to know how to set up my ATI card.
Anyone here available in PM for "aticonfig" tweaking in terminal? I'm very new to ubuntu, but i would like to know how to set up my ATI card.
If you get an answer to that one please feel free to share with me.  I have the ATi drivers installed/configed but I need to speed them up a bit for xscreensaver and the like. ;)
